analysis.description:
HANDELIONdiscountSALE.forwardTokens (/unique_contracts/0x192eb1a97aee2b87c924dc2b8d8eb914dcb5f87f.sol#697-703) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_purchaser,_amount) (/unique_contracts/0x192eb1a97aee2b87c924dc2b8d8eb914dcb5f87f.sol#701-703)
